Judul: Early childhood arts education in the United States: A special issue of Arts Education Policy Review
Abstrak:
In this introduction to Early  Childhood  Arts  Education  in  the  United  States, a special issue of Arts Education  Policy  Review, the editors provide a platform for stakeholders
increased awareness and understandings of the need to ensure childrens rights to arts education. They summarize the five articles comprising this issue, and invite stakeholders to consider example action steps to apply content from this Issue to arts interactions with young children
Kata Kunci: Children ’ s rights; early childhood arts education curriculum; early childhood arts education policy; early childhood teacher preparation and professional development; young children and arts education
Sumber: Department of Music Education, Presser Center for Research and Creativity in Music, Boyer College of Music and Dance, Temple University, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA; b Department of Music Education, School of Music, University of South Carolina, Columbia, South Carolina, USA
